overview:
Tod Francis has 25 years of experience working with marketing and consumer driven companies. Since 2004, Tod has been a managing director of Shasta Ventures where his investment focus is technology-enabled consumer companies. Some of his investments at Shasta include Mint, Flock, Turn, Logoworks, UpTake and companies still operating in stealth mode. Prior to co-founding Shasta Ventures, Tod was a general partner at Trinity Ventures for ten years where he was involved with companies such as Blue Nile, BabyCenter FatBrain, LoopNet, NextCard, Wedding Channel, Jamba Juice and PF Changâ€™s.

Previously, Tod spent ten years in marketing and management positions including serving as a partner at Ram Group Marketing Management, and as a marketing manager at Johnson & Johnson on the Tylenol brand.

* M.B.A., Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University
* B.A., Economics, Northwestern University
